CourseDetails.dynamic.lessons.descriptio: Exercises contained in any of the lessons.
CourseDetails.dynamic.moreCommonWords.de: Sentences containing common words that you didn't master yet.
CourseDetails.dynamic.new.description: Exercises that you didn't answer yet.
CourseDetails.contributors.praise: This course exists thanks to the kindly contributed translations by the following people on Tatoeba.org.
CourseDetails.contributors.andOthers: {others, plural, =1 {And one other contributor.} other {And # other contributors.}}
CourseList.setting.audio.title: Audio exercises
CourseList.setting.audio.explanation: Enables listening exercises and reads out answers to exercises. Requires text-to-speech support of your device.
CourseList.setting.correctAnswerConfirma: Awaits confirmation of all answers. If disabled, correct answer confirmations are shown briefly.
CourseList.settting.ipa.title: IPA transcription
CourseList.settting.ipa.explanation: Displays pronunciation of translations in notation of International Phonetic Alphabet. This is only available for some languages.
CourseTile.numLessonsExercises: {numLessons, plural, =0 {No lessons} =1 {1 lesson} other {# lessons}}, {numExercises, plural, =0 {no exercises} =1 {1 exercise} other {# exercises}}
Licence.name: Licence: {licenseName}
